Description:
All The Work Is Done!
The Moment you walk through the front door you will immediately appreciate this homes perfect renovation, this home presents the opportunity for one lucky buyer to live in a new home with familiar surroundings. Beyond its great facade sitting on a corner allotment of 527sqm, the home's delightful interior comprises of three generous bedrooms all with BIR complemented by a bright central bathroom. The light filled family room is instantly impressive and takes you through to the separate dining area and renovated kitchen with S/S appliances. Perfectly positioned on a corner block this home offer a double lock up garage with drive through access and a huge secure yard perfect for families with kids. The features continue with split system heating and cooling, quality window furnishings, LED down lights throughout and renovated laundry with external access Located in one of Epping’s best pockets and surrounded by a tight knit friendly community this home is walking distance to schools, public transport and Epping plaza. If you are looking for a quality home with all the creature comforts then an inspection is a must.
Insights: 13 Roche Court, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2018 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Living with City Views!
Within close proximity to all your local amenities such as Pacific Epping, Northern Hospital, Freeway access, Schools, Epping Train Station and public transport. Walking distance to upcoming 7 eleven and more shops.
This large apartment boasts one large bedroom (large built in robe) serviced by an adjoining two-way bathroom with large shower, spacious kitchen, generous living area, laundry, large balcony with a stunning view of the city and storage space included.
Further features include:
- a large outdoor balcony (with external power)
- split system heating and cooling,
- dishwasher
- separate lockable storage room inside the building
- underground secure car park with remote control gate
- quality appliances
Don't miss out on this great opportunity!

Close to Everything!

Be quick, this won't last!!.

Prime Development Site or Home Sweet Home
This 606m2 approx corner block in the Epping Central Activity Centre Zone -1 is situated only a short walk to all amenities and provides a fantastic opportunity for townhouse or apartment development or even a doctors clinic.
Alternatively, enjoy this elevated triple fronted, three bedroom home with lock up garage and separate summer kitchen.
Located a short walk to everything
600m to Epping Train Station
300m to St Monica's College and Peters Primary
400m to Epping Police Station
600m Epping Secondary College and High Street Shops
1.2 km to Pacific Epping Shops and the Northern Hospital
2.5km to Costco Wholesale Supermarket
Inspect to appreciate.

Description:
Exquisite Showpiece in a Bluechip Location
Located in a highly sought after location in Epping with parklands at your doorstep, this beautifully presented four bedroom family home offers comfortable living in a quiet friendly location conveniently located near schools, shops and Epping North Shopping Centre.
Offering a great opportunity for a growing family, this is the perfect chance to get into a strong growing market.
This recently renovated home comprises of 2 separate living areas, a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and adjoining meals with bi-fold doors opening to a generous backyard. Outdoor living spreads out to an exceptional undercover alfresco area with a built in kitchenette perfect for entertaining your family/guests all year round!
Upstairs the accommodation expands to four spacious bedrooms, the master bedroom luxuriating in a lavish ensuite & WIR, kids retreat area and a lavish main bathroom.
Additional features include formal family room, parquetry flooring throughout, luxurious 1 seater spas in both bathrooms, central split system & the comforts of ducted heating. This stunning family home certainly will not disappoint!
Call us today!
Lucy Jiang 0430 908 058 (Wechat: Lucyj888)
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435

Description:
Family Home close to all amenities
In this lovely 3 Bedrooms + a Study family home, the focus is on the open floor plan.
Designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers. The Master comprising of a WIR and an en-ensuite, remaining two Bedrooms with BIR's, spacious open plan living area,generous size Study Room and a Lounge Room at the front of the home. A great functional kitchen with ample size bench top and cabinets.Vertical Blinds throughout the home, for extra privacy.
Tiled flooring for easy maintenance to living areas and carpet in all bedrooms.
Just kilometres from the thriving commercial and retail hub of Epping and situated next door to the future Epping North Town Centre. Within minutes away from all amenities.
Luxury Inclusions Offered:
* stainless-steel appliances
* Evaporative Cooling
* Ducted Heating
* Down lights
* Single Garage
* Landscaped garden
* Driveway & much more

Description:
INFINITE STYLE, SUBLIME POSITION Auction: Saturday July 28th @ 11:00am
With a contemporary design and convenient position, this superb townhouse offers a versatile mix of space and style in one of the area's most convenient neighborhood. Immaculately presented interior highlights separate formal lounge and open-plan living/dining area adjoining a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances which flows seamlessly to a paved private entertainers courtyard. Also complementing the ground level are a laundry and powder room. Upstairs, three spacious bedrooms are complete with BIR (WIR to master) and are serviced by a centrally zoned bathroom which offers direct access to the master. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, under-stair storeroom and single garage. This terrific home is perfectly positioned in a central Epping location to allow easy access to a choice of local schools, transport facilities and the full array of the areas amenities.

Description:
Planning Approved in the heart of Epping!
Plans and Permits approved for a 5 level 19 apartment site. 1, 2 & 3 bedrooms. this is an opportunity not to be missed! Walk to Epping train station, Epping's new Costco, Pacific Epping, Northern Hospital, parks and schools. Easy access to the Ring Road, 20kms from CBD and under 30mins to Melbourne Airport. This is truly Central Epping. A magnificent 641m2 (approx.) parcel of prime real estate. An ACZ1 Zone makes this pocket's potential the gateway to Whittlesea Council's 'City of the North' a reality.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
LUXURIOUS LIVING! MAGNIFICENT LOCATION!
Turn key to this magnificent home in the prestigious estate of Lyndarum, facing the park, a neighborhood desired for its excellence in family-friendly living. This beauty offers 4 bedrooms with a large Master including ensuite and a spacious walk-in robe. Entry way leading to a gloriously large open plan kitchen with quality s/s appliances, connects with the light-filled family living and a formal lounge. Glass sliding doors connects the interior with an outdoor entertainment area perfect for entertaining and synthetic grassed backyard for kids to play.
Offering modern comfort, this beautiful residence also boasts ducted heating, cooling, LCD intercom, security alarm system, high doors, walk in pantry, spa bath and much more!. Conveniently located within walking distance to schools , public transport, child care, Manor house drive shopping complex and minutes away from Epping plaza , Northern Hospital. An opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Beautifully Presented, Perfectly Located.
First home buyers, investors and families will be drawn to this solid residence set on 737sqm (approx) of land in a quiet court location, this beautifully presented home is the perfect opportunity to buy in one of Epping’s most sought after positions. On entry you will immediately appreciate the abundance of space this home has to offer, enjoy two huge separate living areas flooded with an abundance of natural light. The updated spacious kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space overlooks the adjoining meals area that leads out to the large back yard with pergola and huge Garage/Work shop. The big master bedroom with BIR is complemented by two further bedrooms with BIR and a great size central bathroom.
Additional Features include ducted heating, air-conditioning; double lock up carport and laundry with external access. Close to shops, public transport and in numerous school zones, this property is a must see, don’t be the one to miss out on this great opportunity.

Under Instructions from the Trustee
Family home in a highly sought-after locale, boasting 4 generous bedrooms, master with updated en-suite and built in robes, step down lounge with timber floors, fully functional kitchen with family/meals area filled with natural light & updated central bathroom. Description:
ORIGINAL, OPPORTUNISTIC, OUTSTANDING!
One for the out of the box thinkers. This original parcel of land is just under 3,000m2. Ready for the opportunistic buyer that can fully take advantage of this central location. An outstanding acquisition with the new Diamond ramp access to Hume Fwy now under construction. Will suit a garden nursery, potential hobby farm perfect for its closeness to the Epping Markets, maybe secure truck parking with its easy access to main roads. May even be the fixer-upper' for those that want to be secluded, yet not too far away. The potential here is limited only by your imagination & Council approval. Today's zoning is Rural Conservation. Who knows what tomorrow may bring.

Description:
Entry Level Opportunity - Leptosermum Building
This fantastic sized apartment is ideally located moments away from Lyndarum Estate, offering residents an inner city lifestyle in a more tranquil and serene fashion. This apartment boasts an open plan kitchen/living area which opens out to a massive north facing balcony, separate lounge/dining area, 1 large bedroom and a separate main bathroom with its own laundry facilities. Extras include; secure off street parking and a storage cage downstairs, secure intercom entrance for visitors, quality fittings and loads of natural light. Your inspection will impress. With cafes, eateries, local shopping centre and local buses only a hop, skip and a jump away, this unique apartment is surely an ideal proposition for down sizers, investors and home buyers alike.

Description:
SOLD BY TEAM SKAD !!
Commencing soon, photos for display purposes only.
Ideally positioned in a highly sought-after pocket of Epping. This impressive home is positioned 23km northeast of Melbourne's CBD. Close to Epping Plaza and Aurora Town Centre and easily accessible from Oherns Road and Hume freeway. This large modern home will suit ideally for first home buyers, investors and downsizers.
Offering:
- 3 x bedrooms plus study room (main with full ensuite)
- 2.5 x bathrooms in total
- Large kitchen that overlooks the rear garden
- Not one but two living rooms which ensures plenty of space for everyone
- Generous size backyard to create a beautiful garden as well a fun play space for children.
- Heating and cooling thru out the property
- Single lock up garage plus driveway car space
Combine all this with Epping Football and tennis club together with public transport services at your fingertips. This is your chance to secure a great family home or investment in an emerging high growing suburb.
Make sure this one is on your "must see" list before it is gone! Feel free to contact Bo Qiang on 0433 610 880 for an inspection.

Description:
MODERN ELEGANCE!
Street Facing, No Body Corporate, situated in the esteemed Estate of Lyndarum is this light filled family home. Immaculately presented, this three-bedroom residence is generously proportioned into multiple living zones. Served by a well appointed kitchen with s/s cooking appliances including d/w, overlooking spacious family area, seamlessly flowing into the undercover entertainment area with low maintenance rear yard.
Staircase leading to first level introduces a rumpus retreat anchoring a master bedroom with ensuite and two further bedrooms sharing the sparkling family bathroom and a balcony with views facing the reserve!
Within walking distance to schools, child care, shops, cafes and public transport at doors step. Only moments away from Epping plaza and Northern Hospital. Added benefits include heating, cooling,double lock up garage and much more! This residence will provide the perfect start for first home buyers, investors, or downsizers.

Description:
A RARE FIND!
A perfect opportunity awaits in this warm and inviting home set in a tranquil Epping locale! Bathed in natural light this immediately move in or easy to rent out home opens onto a welcoming formal lounge, which flows through to a bright open-plan kitchen/meals area adjoining spacious living area. Three generous sized bedrooms, master with ENS and WIR , and a lock up garage completes this stylish and relaxing home. An outdoor undercover entertaining area with a second kitchen, provides a superior level of convenience. Within walking distance to public transport, schools, shops and easy access to Epping Plaza and Northern Hospital. Modern comforts offer ducted heating, cooling, security alarm system, s/s appliances including D/W and Solar panels , currently no electricity bills ! Estimated rental return $400-$410 PW.

Description:
Nest Or Invest
An unmissable opportunity to secure this lovely home in the much sought after Lyndarum Estate. Perfectly positioned close to Epping Views Primary School and the Lyndarum Town Centre this home boasts 3 bedrooms, master with ensuite & WIR, open plan kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and walk-in pantry, adjoining meals and family area, and double lock-up garage with remote and internal access. Add to this ducted heating, evaporative cooling, downlights, porcelain tiles and a meticulous low maintenance landscaped garden. Perfect for first home buyers or investors as well as an ideal option for downsizers.

Description:
MODERN ELEGANCE!
Street Facing, No Body Corporate, situated in the esteemed Estate of Lyndarum is this light filled family home. Immaculately presented, this three-bedroom residence is generously proportioned into multiple living zones. Served by a well appointed kitchen with s/s cooking appliances including d/w, overlooking spacious family area, seamlessly flowing into the undercover entertainment area with low maintenance rear yard.
Staircase leading to first level introduces a rumpus retreat anchoring a master bedroom with ensuite and two further bedrooms sharing the sparkling family bathroom and a balcony with views facing the reserve!
Within walking distance to schools, child care, shops, cafes and public transport at doors step. Only moments away from Epping plaza and Northern Hospital. Added benefits include heating, cooling,double lock up garage and much more! This residence will provide the perfect start for first home buyers, investors, or downsizers.

Description:
Comfortable, Convenient And Ready To Be Enjoyed
Moments from parklands and an easy stroll to the station, schools, High Street's cafes and eateries and the Plaza, this much loved family home on a generous allotment delivers a perfect opportunity to get a fabulous start in a lifestyle location.
Three bedrooms including a main with ensuite complement three generous living areas including family meals opening to a private alfresco area. Comfortable, convenient and ready to be enjoyed today, it provides exciting scope to further update if desired.
• Ducted heating & air conditioner
• Solid timber kitchen
• Three spacious living areas
• Large garage with workshop space
• Shed
• Outdoor entertainment area
